text:
On the sealed documents were the following names:

Nehemiah the governor, son of Hacaliah, along with Zedekiah,
Seraiah, Azariah, Jeremiah,
Pashhur, Amariah, Malkijah,
Hattush, Shebaniah, Malluch,
Harim, Meremoth, Obadiah,
Daniel, Ginnethon, Baruch,
Meshullam, Abijah, Mijamin,
Maaziah, Bilgai, and Shemaiah. These were the priests.

The Levites were as follows:

Jeshua son of Azaniah, Binnui of the sons of Henadad, Kadmiel.

Their colleagues were as follows:

Shebaniah, Hodiah, Kelita, Pelaiah, Hanan,
Mica, Rehob, Hashabiah,
Zaccur, Sherebiah, Shebaniah,
Hodiah, Bani, and Beninu.

The leaders of the people were as follows:

Parosh, Pahath Moab, Elam, Zattu, Bani,
Bunni, Azgad, Bebai,
Adonijah, Bigvai, Adin,
Ater, Hezekiah, Azzur,
Hodiah, Hashum, Bezai,
Hariph, Anathoth, Nebai,
Magpiash, Meshullam, Hezir,
Meshezabel, Zadok, Jaddua,
Pelatiah, Hanan, Anaiah,
Hoshea, Hananiah, Hasshub,
Hallohesh, Pilha, Shobek,
Rehum, Hashabnah, Maaseiah,
Ahiah, Hanan, Anan,
Malluch, Harim, and Baanah.

“Now the rest of the people—the priests, the Levites, the gatekeepers, the singers, the temple attendants, and all those who have separated themselves from the neighboring peoples because of the law of God, along with their wives, their sons, and their daughters, all of whom are able to understand—

hereby participate with their colleagues the town leaders and enter into a curse and an oath to adhere to the law of God which was given through Moses the servant of God, and to obey carefully all the commandments of the Lord our Lord, along with his ordinances and his statutes.
“We will not give our daughters in marriage to the neighboring peoples, and we will not take their daughters in marriage for our sons.

We will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03947 01992">buy</st><n id="1" /> on the <st data-num="07676" class="">Sabbath</st> or on a <st data-num="06944" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> from the <st data-num="0776" class="">neighboring</st> <st data-num="05971" class="">peoples</st> who <st data-num="0935" class="">bring</st> their <st data-num="04728" class="">wares</st> and <st data-num="03605" class="">all kinds of</st> <st data-num="07668" class="">grain</st> to <st data-num="04376" class="">sell</st> on the <st data-num="07676" class="">Sabbath</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st>. We will let the fields <st data-num="05203" class="">lie fallow</st> every <st data-num="07637" class="">seventh</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">year</st>, and we will cancel <st data-num="03605 03027">every</st> <st data-num="04855" class="">loan</st>.<n id="2" />

We <st data-num="05975" class="">accept responsibility</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">for fulfilling</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="04687 05921">commands</st> to <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="07992" class="">one-third</st> of a <st data-num="08255" class="">shekel</st> each <st data-num="08141" class="">year</st> for the <st data-num="05656" class="">work</st> of the <st data-num="01004" class="">temple</st><n id="3" /> of our <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st>,

for the loaves of presentation and for the regular grain offerings and regular burnt offerings, for the Sabbaths, for the new moons, for the appointed meetings, for the holy offerings, for the sin offerings to make atonement for Israel, and for all the work of the temple of our God.

“We—the priests, the Levites, and the people—have cast lots concerning the wood offerings, to bring them to the temple of our God according to our families at the designated times year by year to burn on the altar of the Lord our God, as is written in the law.
We also accept responsibility for bringing the firstfruits of our land and the firstfruits of every fruit tree year by year to the temple of the Lord.

We also accept responsibility, as is <st data-num="03789" class="">written</st> in the <st data-num="08451" class="">law</st>, for <st data-num="0935" class="">bringing</st> the <st data-num="01060" class="">firstborn</st> of our <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> and our <st data-num="0929" class="">cattle</st> and the <st data-num="01060" class="">firstborn</st> of our <st data-num="01241" class="">herds</st> and of our <st data-num="06629" class="">flocks</st> to the <st data-num="01004" class="">temple</st> of our <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st>, to the <st data-num="03548" class="">priests</st> who are <st data-num="08334" class="">ministering</st> in the <st data-num="01004" class="">temple</st> of our <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st>.

We will also <st data-num="0935" class="">bring</st> the <st data-num="07225" class="">first</st> of our <st data-num="06182" class="">coarse meal</st>, of our <st data-num="08641" class="">contributions</st>, of the <st data-num="06529" class="">fruit</st> of <st data-num="03605" class="">every</st> <st data-num="06086" class="">tree</st>, of <st data-num="08492" class="">new wine</st>, and of <st data-num="03323" class="">olive oil</st> to the <st data-num="03548" class="">priests</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="03957" class="">storerooms</st> of the <st data-num="01004" class="">temple</st> of our <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st>, along with a <st data-num="04643" class="">tenth</st> of the produce<n id="1" /> of our <st data-num="0127" class="">land</st> to the <st data-num="03881" class="">Levites</st>, for the <st data-num="03881" class="">Levites</st> are the <st data-num="01992" class="">ones</st> who <st data-num="06237" class="">collect the tithes</st> in <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> where we <st data-num="05656" class="">work</st>.<n id="2" />

A <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> of <st data-num="0175" class="">Aaron’s</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">line</st><n id="1" /> will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="03881" class="">Levites</st> when the <st data-num="03881" class="">Levites</st> <st data-num="06237" class="">collect the tithes</st>, and the <st data-num="03881" class="">Levites</st> will <st data-num="05927" class="">bring up</st> a <st data-num="04643" class="">tenth</st> of the <st data-num="04643" class="">tithes</st> to the <st data-num="01004" class="">temple</st> of our <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="03957" class="">storerooms</st> of the <st data-num="01004 0214">treasury</st>.

The Israelites and the Levites will bring the contribution of the grain, the new wine, and the olive oil to the storerooms where the utensils of the sanctuary are kept, and where the priests who minister stay, along with the gatekeepers and the singers. We will not neglect the temple of our God.”
